flawed_nl_solution:
Alexandre read 120 * 1/10 = <<120*1/10=1200>>1200 novels.
So, Jordan read 120 - 1200 = <<120-1200=-1080>>-1080 novels more than Alexandre.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12, not 1200. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
